about_dialog_description: Maskbook is a portal to the new, open Internet. With Maskbook, you can send encrypted posts to your friends, participate in cryptocurrency lucky-draws, and share encrypted files on the platforms you are already using.
add_to_key_store_failed_text:
{{error}}
This public key won't be saved in Maskbook.
add_to_key_store_failed_title: The public key is NOT verified

add_to_key_store_verifying: The public key has been found, verifying‚Ä¶
additional_post_box__encrypted_failed: Please paste the following text into the post box.
additional_post_box__steganography_post_: In the next step, Maskbook will save an image that contains encrypted message. Please attach this image to your post so others can decrypt it.
This post is shared with my friends. You may install Maskbook to decrypt the content from the image. ([I:b]) {{random}}

name: Name

set_up_consent_data_collection_hint: Maskbook will collect some data when you use it, but the developers of Maskbook have no access to them. The collected data are stored locally, except for the data which are necessary for enabling your friends to decrypt the posts you shared.

set_up_restore_confirmation_hint: The following data will be imported.
settings_advance_security_desc: Render content in Shadow Root to prevent social network webpages from accessing decryption results.
settings_ancient_post_compatibility_mode: Enable if you need to decrypt ancient posts (created before Jan 2020).
settings_image_based_payload_desc: Publishing post with image payload instead of text payload.
shared_choose_identity_title: Touch to switch your Maskbook account
share_wallet_hint: You can share your wallet by address or QR code.
wallet_confirmation_hint: I confirm that I need to create a wallet.
wallet_notification: This will create a new wallet other than the default wallet. You are responsible for keeping the private key to the wallet safe. Please also note that Maskbook won't be able to pay for your transactions on Ethereum.
